summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, referencing a cooperator with urgent information about Jeffrey Epstein. It serves as a brief communication offering contact for follow-up.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is reaching out regarding a cooperator with urgent information about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York sent an email on August 28, 2019.
The email references a cooperator who has 'urgent' information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender offers to be contacted for further discussion regarding this information.
